REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1633 reute r f BC-IMARK-INDS-<IMAR.O>-V 04-21 0041

TEXT.TITLE: IMARK INDS <IMAR.O> VOTES ANNUAL 25 CT DIVIDEND
TEXT.BODY: Imark Industries Inc said its directors approved payment of an annual dividend of 25 cts on May 21, record May seven. The company paid the same dividend last year. Reuter
